title: Blended Technology-Enhanced Program for Large-Scale Advanced Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Customized Learning Design for Advanced Language Proficiency in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can articulate over 15 specialized language expressions monthly using smartphone-based LMS
Learners can complete three or more virtual language project activities using digital collaboration tools
Learners can achieve over 10% score improvement in standardized language tests (TOEFL/IELTS/OPIc, etc.) using mobile-optimized content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
